s1.title: Hello, I am a Full-Stack developer javascript and here in this page you can see some of my projects.
s1.name: Ian Rivas

s2.project_text: A landing page with information about Evangelion characters,anime season and movies. I make this project to practice react-router-dom , React-Boostrap, Sass and deploy pages in Netlify.

s3.project_text: This was a challenge of a company called Basement. Small e-commerce to practice all the options of add, delete and update a Cart .I like the design a lot and with this i practice NextJS, TypeScript, Tailwind, LocalStorage and deploy pages in Vercel.

s4.project_text: This was a popular api so i want to replicate it. I made the api with Nodejs, Express and TypeScript. The frontend app i made it with React, again TypeScript, react-query, styled-components (the app is responsive without mediaqueries). The api and the app was in a monorepo of npm and deployed in Heroku.
